review:
In today's Era.. Shishuka is one of the most spectacular Hospital for kids treatment,  You will find topnotch doctors with very warm heart. Where we can see right from Hygiene to the treatment is excellent.. each doctor's treatment to the kids is mindblowing.. all we can say is, we can trust the Doctors here where we just say our concerns about the health of our kids and they will take care of the rest.. and the way they give hope to the parents is just mindblowing.
 Hatsoff to the Doctor's and special thanks to Dr. Bharat Kumar Reddy and entire staff for the treatment from the bottom of our heart.. We pray Allah azoujal give Shifa/cure in their hands for every soul they touch.. Ameen..üëçüëç
